original_title: Scholarship grant by Automobile Association of Ceylon for students of University of Colombo
original_body_lines: Automobile Association of Ceylon, at the request of Senior Professor H.D. Karunaratne, Vice Chancellor of University of Colombo, had undertaken to sponsor 05 needy students for a monthly payment of Rs.5,000.00 each for a period of 36 months.

The handing over the sponsorship cheque was held on Tuesday 04th April 2023 at College House of the University of Colombo in the presence of the AAC representative Dhammika Attygalle – President, Desamannya Nandadasa Rajapaksha – Vice Patron Ananda Dangalla – Vice President Dr. Vijaya Corea, Prasanna De Zoysa, P.B. Kulatunga, Dampiya Banagala – EXCO Members and Devapriya Hettiarachchi – Secretary and the representative of the University of Colombo Senior Professor H.D. Karunaratne- Vice Chancellor K.A. Edward – Registrar, Gayani De Silva – Assistant Registrar of the University.
